mapper.select:
select
from private_recipe_data where private_recipe_id = #{private_recipe_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND account_id = #{account_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CONVERT(day,SIGNED) >= CONVERT(#{day ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},SIGNED )

select
from private_recipe_data where private_recipe_id = #{private_recipe_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND account_id = #{account_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CONVERT(#{day ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},SIGNED )>=CONVERT(day,SIGNED)

select
from private_recipe_data where private_recipe_id = #{private_recipe_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND account_id = #{account_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order BY day ASC , end_time ASC
